content: this is a very quick and easy pattern that describes how to make a single pop-it bubble it can be used to make keychains or multiple bubbles can be made and stitched together to make a larger pop-it toy in theory you can even make an entire blanket with these if you so desire each bubble is worked in the round and works up quickly with scrap yarn customizations are endless the final shape around the outside of each bubble is a hexagon if you would prefer a square i have included an alternative final round as always i would encourage you to get creative and make it your own i love seeing your work and i m always available to answer questions ethridge101@yahoo com
